overview: Rebecca Bishop is a managment executive with Affymetrix, Inc. (NASDAQ:AFFX), the company that first introduced high density microarray technology to the life sciences marketplace. She has been with Affymetrix for 7 years and previously was the Microarray Marketing Director for MWG Scientific. Ms. Bishop began working in the life sciences space in 1993, holding executive positions with Curtin Matheson Scientific, Baxter, and Bio-Rad Laboratories.
